Graph to data frame

Source: R/graph_utils.R
graph2df.Rd

Convert graph object to dataframe with source and target columns

graph2df(graph)

Arguments

graph

Network

Value

data frame

Examples

dag <- create_random_DAG(30, 0.2)
graph2df(dag)

#>    source sink
#> 1      n1   n6
#> 2      n1   n8
#> 3      n1  n13
#> 4      n1  n21
#> 5      n1  n30
#> 6      n2   n3
#> 7      n2  n12
#> 8      n2  n14
#> 9      n2  n19
#> 10     n5  n10
#> 11     n5  n16
#> 12     n9  n14
#> 13     n9  n15
#> 14     n9  n19
#> 15    n11  n13
#> 16     n6  n30
#> 17     n6  n28
#> 18     n3   n4
#> 19     n3  n10
#> 20     n3  n15
#> 21    n12  n14
#> 22    n12  n16
#> 23    n12  n18
#> 24    n12  n23
#> 25    n12  n22
#> 26     n4   n7
#> 27     n4   n8
#> 28     n4  n16
#> 29     n4  n21
#> 30     n4  n23
#> 31     n4  n17
#> 32    n10  n15
#> 33    n10  n20
#> 34    n10  n26
#> 35    n14  n18
#> 36    n14  n24
#> 37    n14  n27
#> 38    n14  n29
#> 39     n7  n13
#> 40     n7  n17
#> 41     n8  n20
#> 42     n8  n28
#> 43    n16  n21
#> 44    n15  n18
#> 45    n15  n23
#> 46    n15  n24
#> 47    n15  n26
#> 48    n15  n29
#> 49    n13  n17
#> 50    n13  n27
#> 51    n21  n24
#> 52    n18  n19
#> 53    n17  n20
#> 54    n24  n30
#> 55    n19  n22
#> 56    n19  n25
#> 57    n19  n26
#> 58    n20  n27
#> 59    n26  n28
#> 60    n28  n29
